data.title: Ordinary Injustice: How America Holds Court
data.meta_description: Edition: First Edition Book Condition: Collectible - Like New Jacket Condition: Like New Binding: Hardcover
data.text:
Edition: First Edition

Book Condition: Collectible - Like New

Jacket Condition: Like New

Binding: Hardcover

First Edition, First Printing (Full Number Line). Not price-clipped ($27.00 price intact). Published by Metropolitan Books, 2009. Octavo. Blue cloth over blue boards stamped in silver. Signed by author on flyleaf. Book is like new with no writing. Sharp corners and spine straight. Binding tight. Dust jacket is like new. A lovely signed copy of this groundbreaking look at the failures of the U.S. court system. 307 pages. ISBN: 9780805074475.

100% positive feedback. 30 day money back guarantee. NEXT DAY SHIPPING! Excellent customer service. Please email with any questions or if you would like a photo. All books packed carefully and ship with free delivery confirmation/tracking. All books come with free bookmarks. Ships from Southampton, New York.

Item #92657
